mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_ANS( ANS_BD_NUM, USER_NAME, CONTENT, QS_BD_NUM, ANS_LIKE_CNT, ANS_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( BEDU_ANS.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{content}, #{qsBdNum}, #{ansLikeCnt}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ANS_BD_NUM AS ansBdNum, USER_NAME AS userName, QS_BD_NUM AS qsBdNum, CONTENT, ANS_LIKE_CNT AS ansLikeCnt, REG_DATE AS regDate, ANS_DATE AS ansDate FROM T_BEDU_ANS WHERE QS_BD_NUM = #{qsBdNum} ORDER BY ANS_BD_NUM DESC
